title: Print, "President Lincoln and His Cabinet Members at Washington, D.C., from Harper's Weekly, July 13, 1861, p. 437.", July 13, 1861
medium: Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper.
description: Horizontal view of an interior with President Lincoln and his cabinet seated around a table and facing the spectator.  Secretary Seward stands behind the President and the names of the other cabinet members are indicated in the margin below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "President Lincoln and His Cabinet Members at Washington, D.C., from Harper's Weekly, July 13, 1861, p. 437.", July 13, 1861.
July 13, 1861. Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper.. Gift of Arthur B. Carlson. 1951-93-17.
